body_html: Adding a call to gc.collect() just before the process starts shutting-down seems to fix the problem for us, so it does look like "normal" garbage collections are OK, but when the Python VM is shutting-down calling BaseSession's destructor is problematic.
body_text: Adding a call to gc.collect() just before the process starts shutting-down seems to fix the problem for us, so it does look like "normal" garbage collections are OK, but when the Python VM is shutting-down calling BaseSession's destructor is problematic.
body: Adding a call to `gc.collect()` just before the process starts shutting-down seems to fix the problem for us, so it does look like "normal" garbage collections are OK, but when the Python VM is shutting-down calling `BaseSession`'s destructor is problematic.
